body: Should we have an `else` to handle the case where `sizes_value == nullptr`? If you assume `sizes_value` must not be null, please use `CHECK(sizes_value != nullptr)` instead.
body_html: Should we have an else to handle the case where sizes_value == nullptr? If you assume sizes_value must not be null, please use CHECK(sizes_value != nullptr) instead.
body_text: Should we have an else to handle the case where sizes_value == nullptr? If you assume sizes_value must not be null, please use CHECK(sizes_value != nullptr) instead.
